description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The Community Schools program coordinates many services for 40 “full service Community Schools” which are designed to provide students with real world experiences, address barriers to learning, and form partnerships with families and the community. Each participating school has an assigned Community School Manager (CSM). ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Services","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{"uri":"https://www.ousd.org/Page/15122"}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" include after school programs, school health centers, attendance and discipline, restorative justice, and more.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
